summary:
Craftable skimpy vampire armors from Dawnguard DLC. Adds three new colors to the cloth portions of 
the armor,Black, Blue, and Red. Alternative Texture Replacer optional files included that work with 
vanilla meshes.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Skimpy Vampire Armor BBP
Author: Edhildil
09,27,2013
ver1.2

UPDATE: fixed the first person mesh so first person should now work properly (parts were invisible)


[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

Craftable skimpy vampire armors from Dawnguard DLC. Adds three new colors to the cloth portions of 
the armor,Black, Blue, and Red. Alternative Texture Replacer optional files included that work with 
vanilla meshes.


About Wha? (F.A.Q.)
===============================

About Wha?#1 
------------------

One would freeze to death wearing this in skyrim!

Vampires are already cold and dead. 

About Wha?#2 
-------------------

Why so skimpy? 

A: Vampires seduce people all the time in order to feed. If they look hot and
a fool falls for this trick, the fool is toast and the vampire feeds. Dont be cattle (moo.)

About Wha?#3 
-------------------

It doesn\\\'t look like it would protect very much.

A: Tell that to a super fast vampire next time you get attacked by one...they just might stop 
attacking you to hear out your point...or not.


About Wha?#4
-------------------

Can the Supreme Vampire Tailor teach me how to craft these awesome armors?

Yes, it\\\'s under the Leather catagory at a forge.

About Wha?#5
-------------------
It is too skimpy and revealing for my tastes. Can you make it less skimpy?

A: No. Well, yes, but I am not going to.

About Wha?#6
-------------------

Why won\\\'t the ingame weight sliders change the body size?

A: Because the body size is made to a custom shape.


[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]

Dawnguard DLC (Steam)

Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game. Or compatible textures.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32 (or any BBP skeleton) 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800

CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling ( BBP animations)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888

 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location 
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



[img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/9233/uninstall.png[/img]

delete the included files of whichever file you have downloaded:

Main File:
----------------------

Data/meshes/armor/edhildil/vampire

Replacer Armors:
----------------------

data/meshes/dlc01/clothes/vampire/ 

vampirerobesf_0
vampirerobesf_1
vampirerobesf_alt_0
vampirerobesf_alt_1

Replacer textures:
---------------------

data/textures/dlc01/clothes/vampire/

robesf.dds 

This will revert your game back to vanilla meshes and textures.


[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Bethesda (original meshes and textures)
Caliente for CBBE
Cherryhotaling for BBP
Edhildil (these new meshes and textures)



Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
Gimp 2

Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes/textures in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod. Craftable version coming soon so please let me post that.  Enjoy!
author: Edhildil
